title: Endosymbiosis and the structure of ecosystems 1

content.question: Endosymbiosis has been proposed as a model for the evolution of eukaryotic cell structure. Identify and explain TWO pieces of evidence that support the endosymbiotic theory.

frqParts.text: Endosymbiosis has been proposed as a model for the evolution of eukaryotic cell structure. Identify and explain TWO pieces of evidence that support the endosymbiotic theory.
